english.info_jump: Press W or Right Click To Jump!
english.info_bar:
You can hang on the bar!
Press S or Right Click to drop down!
english.info_double_jump: Blue Blocks Give You Double Jump!
english.info_feather_falling: Feather Blocks Give You Feather Falling!
english.info_pass_through:
You can pass through the platform blocks!
But in only one direction!
english.info_wind:
Wind make you fly!
Hold S or Right Click to drop down!
english.info_wall_jump: You can jump on the wall!
